ratings.comment: If you're on this site because you get to have M. Voelker as a teacher, I'm so jealous. I would switch around my entire schedule just to be in his class again...and I'm not even a French major. Easily one of the best, if not the best, teachers at this school.
I LOVE FRANZ! Sometimes he's a little spacey, and forgets names, but boy is he a character!!! Oh yeah, and he interrupts a lot too.

Franz is so funny.  He is a really cool Swiss guy with an amazing accent.  The class isn't hard at all and he does a good job of explaining things we don't know. you will do tons of fun daily activities.
Excellent T.A.! Very helpful and so so nice! (Funny, too!)
He grows on you. He's a good-natured person. Take his class, it's good.

Very nice, funny, and extremley helpful.  He gives a little quiz each day on the homework from the night before but they are very easy. Very nice and never makes a student feel uncomfortable if they don't know an answer. There is no teaching of grammer in this class so there is alot of book use, but he will always help after during or before class.
Very nice, speaks entirely in French! Funny too.  Little quizes every day taken from cahier d'exercices.  Usually have 2-3 exercises in workbook every night.  Not hard.
take him, you won't regret it.  his accent will melt your heart and weaken your knees.  a lot of what you learn is from the book.  it's pretty easy and he's always willing to help.
